backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, access control, and surgery case creation with types and comparison helpers defined.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON stub.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Guide for when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with extensive theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script performing a deterministic clean rebuild and frontend redeploy with deployment summary output.
Script that cleans frontend artifacts, reinstalls deps, regenerates backend bindings, checks for legacy methods, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Instructions for verifying that the deployed frontend uses up‑to‑date backend bindings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, backend connection, profile setup, case list UI, search, sorting, and case form modals.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty file placeholder for camera capture component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with patient info, task toggling, edit and delete actions, and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing cases with prefill logic, demographics extraction, validation, and task requirements handling.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Fetches, filters, sorts, and displays surgery cases with loading, error, empty-state, and search handling.
Reusable date input with text entry, validation, and calendar popover selection.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that parses pasted text to auto-extract and return patient demographics.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty-case messaging and optional migration guidance based on authentication and connection state.
frontend/src/components/cases/ServerCase: Displays a server-load failure alert with classified error messaging and retry option.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Sort field and direction controls for ordering the case list.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Displays required, incomplete tasks with checkboxes and optional colored borders, allowing toggling task status.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all stored cases to a downloadable CSV file and shows toast notifications for success or errors.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Handles CSV file import, parsing, validation, and sequential case creation with user feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Shows a prominent error banner with troubleshooting tips and actions when backend connection fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs details, resets on key changes, and displays a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the footer with current year, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays app header with branding and login/logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Startup error screen offering troubleshooting guidance, retry, and reload options based on error type.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: UI bar showing online status, backend connectivity, and a sync button with toast-based feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to add error detection, user-friendly error messages, and retry logic for actor initialization.
Combines identity, actor state, and a ping probe to determine backend connectivity with unified error handling and retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages merged local and server surgery cases with load, add, update, and synchronization helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Derives an environment label (Draft or Live) from the current hostname.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and paginated surgery cases, including create operations with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements local-to-server sync for surgery cases, including pagination fetch, conflict merging, normalization, error handling, and cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and design tokens for light and dark themes, setting global colors and styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the root application.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines local surgery case types and form data structures extending backend case models.
Classifies backend errors into categories with user-friendly messages and provides helpers for actor initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV import/export utilities for surgery cases, including parsing, validation, warnings, and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Implements timezone-safe date-only parsing and formatting utilities, plus legacy date conversions and helpers.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Parses pasted text with regex and heuristics to extract patient demographic fields. Returns a best‑effort structured demographics object.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and validates a persisted admin token from URL or sessionStorage. Provides helpers to check whether the token is missing.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, saves, and clears locally stored surgery cases with bigint handling and field normalization. Ensures safe persistence in localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases while preserving local-only fields and prepares cases for sync by applying pending local changes. Server fields override shared fields when merging.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the most recent case matching an MRN and extracts demographic fields to prefill a new case. Sorting is based on arrival date and case ID.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and provides helpers to create, normalize, and interpret task checklists for cases. Supports legacy formats and initialization for new cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing. Allows persistence of parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and new feature requests, including auditing frontend calls to deprecated backend APIs and ensuring redeployment with updated bindings.
